scenarios.name: buffer then gradually decrease
scenarios.description: Enqueue a lot of items, then dequeue rate > enqueue rate, so gradually remove the items.

scenarios.name: zigzag
scenarios.description: Enqueue a lot, then dequeue to zero, repeatedly.

scenarios.name: enqueue-zigzag-dequeue
scenarios.description: Enqueue a lot, then [zigzag](#zigzag) with 1/3 of the size, then dequeue to zero.

scenarios.name: enqueue only
scenarios.description: Simply enqueue a lot of items, without any dequeue.
